website_summaries.verdict: A very inexpensive way to give yourself a layer of exterior surveillance protection if you don't want many of the bells and whistles.
pros: Connects directly into your own digital recorder
Fixed lens offers a wide-angle view
Can work well in low-light situations
cons: No zoom on this and only has 2 MP resolution

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I figured I’d try these after a camera I had failed. The night time lighting from the single flood model is really good. Another review said you needed a special base, which I bought. You don’t need it. The camera comes off the base so you can mount the case & then re-attach the camera. Picture quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Zach S.

customer_reviews.title: Remarkable video resolution and coverage
customer_reviews.text: This camera almost covers the entire area that would normally require 2 other cameras. Perhaps that coverage is possible if I had the time to explore all available placement options. However, this may not always easy or feasible, especially, on high buildings.
customer_reviews.author: Winstorm

customer_reviews.title: This camera is for low light areas. Has a ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is for low light areas. Has a wide angle 2.8mm lens. Would get 5 stars but still dark with no light.
customer_reviews.author: jacent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first based on the price... but i sure was surprised. The color/ daytime image is amazing. I can practically see my entire street... not that was my intention. Night vision is ... i dont know... okay. I dont know what to expect or what is possible with night vision technology. At the end of the day... it works for me
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  Swain

customer_reviews.title: Good resolution, great field of view, poor aspect ratio
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this camera, it's the 1st 5MP camera I've tried. Aspect ratio makes everything look wider. Photo cell engages Night Mode long before my other cameras. Tech needs improvement. Literature is brief and doesn't discuss flashing error icons. I have one that appears to be a "Low battery". Any feedback would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how cheap these became... great value . Good picture but for my next camera I would do minimum 8mp. These just don’t read car license plates more than 30ft away
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.text: These are great cameras. You can’t beat the quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality, good price, small size
customer_reviews.text: Im not happy with this new model, I prefer the older model, its impossible to find a perfect fit junction box because the diameter of the camera its 4.25 and any junction box match the diameter. Of course you can go for a big electrical square or round but not meet the requirements of many people. The camera picture is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: After replacing a 10 y/o Swann DVR with a Tigre system I found on Amazon I also had to upgrade some of the 720p bullet camera as the color had faded to black/white only. This camera is well beyond the video quality I expected. Great bang for the buck. Save the money unless you want true 4K definition.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Night Vision and Wide Angle
customer_reviews.text: replaced 3 cameras and these cameras night vision and clarity is outstanding. The viewing angle is greater than 90 degrees and covers more area.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great day time, horrible nighttime image.
customer_reviews.text: Great daytime clarity but horrible nighttime image quality. Worst out of all my 13 cameras. But I still bought another one for add on because the daytime is really good. I wouldn't put it where it counts for intruder identification.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE PESSY

customer_reviews.title: Black-and-white but night vision is decent
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera because of the night vision one of the better ones I've seen for night vision
customer_reviews.author: vito

customer_reviews.title: Super night vision, solid budget camera
customer_reviews.text: After 5 bad cameras from different venders, this camera is amazing the night vision is 5/5 and day is 5/5 . I recommend 🤙🏿
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good camara looks really great in night and day a must get!!
customer_reviews.author: ice718

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good price
customer_reviews.text: It’s work pretty good easy to install. So far working great
customer_reviews.author: angel l.navarro

customer_reviews.title: Junk do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Junk do not buy contacted the vendor but just getting a run around
customer_reviews.author: Bradley B.

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Home surveillance. Works as good as the ones installed by the surveillance company
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for most dvr and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, simple and looks great. I used it for small business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product, As described will definitely do business again. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Byron Jarrin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, very professional.....
customer_reviews.text: I am more than satisfied with the product, more than 5 stars of quality, and more than 5 stars with the excellent service that the company has given me ... highly recommended ...
customer_reviews.author: Wildin Trigueros

product_meta.title: R-Tech 2MP 4-in-1 AHD/CVI/TVI/Analog Outdoor/Indoor Turret Dome Camera with Matrix IR Night Vision – 2.8mm Fixed Lens – White
product_meta.description: Size:2MP| Color:WhiteThe CA-TVI-IRD80-1080P-MATRIX is an outdoor, night/day dome TVI security camera with a 2.8mm fixed lens and easy mounting system perfect for protecting any business or home. The new TVI security cameras offer a great alternative to IP systems. These cameras provide the resolution and simplicity of IP, but with a high definition analog signal. The new TVI-DVRs are also backwards compatible with analog and IP cameras making upgrading existing systems easy and affordable.
feature_bullets: 1080P (2MP) High Resolution 1/3" CMOS Sensor for (TVI/AHD/CVI/Analog) DVRs
High-Intensity Matrix IR LED for Night Vision up to 50m (164ft)
2.8mm Fixed Wide Angle Lens for Crystal Clear Focus - No Adjustment Required
IP67 Outdoor Weatherproof Rating with Sturdy Metal Construction

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
